newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin up six cents to 14.68 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin up six cents to 14.68 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price rose six cents to 14.68 ringgit ($5.86) a kg in tandem with overnight gains on the London Metal Exchange (LME).
"The LME was up and this led to some good buying and less offers (to sell)," said a dealer.
Initial offers totalled 17 tonnes against bids of 132. Turnover was at 87 tonnes compared to 96 tonnes on Friday. Buyers were from Europe, Japan and Malaysia.
The premium rose to $40 from $35. Near term direction depended on speculation in copper on the LME, said dealers.
